SELECT a.forcer_id, a.wh_id, (SELECT wh_name FROM bas_wh WHERE wh_id = a.wh_id) AS wh_name, a.forcer_no, a.is_enable, /*a.create_by,*/ a.create_at, /*a.update_by,*/ a.update_at, nvl((select su.user_name from sys_login_agent sla inner join sys_user su on su.user_id = sla.user_id where to_char(sla.login_id) = a.create_by), a.create_by) create_by, nvl((select su.user_name from sys_login_agent sla inner join sys_user su on su.user_id = sla.user_id where to_char(sla.login_id) = a.update_by), a.update_by) update_by FROM bas_ice_forcer a inner join bas_wh_owner bwo on a.wh_id = bwo.wh_id where 1 = 1
AND a.forcer_no = #{forcer_no} AND a.forcer_no != 'N/A'
AND a.is_enable = #{is_enable}
order by a.forcer_no
